body:
The size of MKL_LONG is platform dependent. If on linux/mac, it is 64 bit; and if on windows, it is 32 bit. So I kind of need to programmatically compute it. 

I will delete the other commented out ones as they are not used.
body_html:
The size of MKL_LONG is platform dependent. If on linux/mac, it is 64 bit; and if on windows, it is 32 bit. So I kind of need to programmatically compute it.

I will delete the other commented out ones as they are not used.
body_text:
The size of MKL_LONG is platform dependent. If on linux/mac, it is 64 bit; and if on windows, it is 32 bit. So I kind of need to programmatically compute it.
I will delete the other commented out ones as they are not used.
